options: a. Note the Availability Zone for each EC2 instance before stopping it. Restart the instances in the same Availability Zones after the 2-week company shutdown.
b. Run the applications on EC2 instances enabled for hibernation. Hibernate the instances before the 2-week company shutdown.
c. Modify the application to store the data on instance store volumes. Reattach the volumes while restarting them.
d. Snapshot the EC2 instances before stopping them. Restore the snapshot after restarting the instances.
questions.answer: b. Run the applications on EC2 instances enabled for hibernation. Hibernate the instances before the 2-week company shutdown.
